summary: Comprehensive testing of TutorMaven platform completed - backend APIs fully functional, frontend working with one minor fix applied

minor_issues.issue: Initially expected wrong parameter format - fixed during testing
minor_issues.resolution: Updated test to use correct query parameter format

ui_bugs.issue: Missing Users import causing runtime error
ui_bugs.resolution: Added missing Users import from lucide-react
